name: Pam's Fantastic Escape: Ch. 1
description:
Here we go again! Pam's back for more escape puzzle fun!

This is the first chapter of "Pam's Fantastic Escape," a big adventure for Pam's family and her friend, Linn (the playable character), where they go camping and make some fantastical discoveries along the way. 

In "Chapter 1: The Garage," everyone is ready to leave, but first you need to help Pam and Tammy leave the garage.

The story for the whole game (it's several chapters!) is already planned out, and the game will be released with the remaining chapters together after everything is finished. Of course, the popularity of Chapter 1 might have a little impact on the timing. ;) 

Please, feel free to leave a comment any time. Your communication and support encourages me a lot to keep working hard.
